quest.name: In His Mistress's Name
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Oul Sigun is eager to show you something.
objectives: Deliver the silver medallion to Nimbus.

dialogue.name: OULSIGUN
dialogue.text: Look what I found! A silver medallion! It was lying near a leafman on the other side of Il Mheg.

dialogue.name: OULSIGUN
dialogue.text: There's a name engraved in it: Nimbus. Doesn't much sound like a mortal. An amaro, perhaps? Do you happen to know a creature by that name?

dialogue.name: OULSIGUN
dialogue.text: You do!? Well then, you must deliver it to him in Wolekdorf. Here!

dialogue.name: OULSIGUN
dialogue.text: What a coincidence that you should know this Nimbus. See that the medallion is delivered to him!

dialogue.name: NIMBUS
dialogue.text: Hm? You have something for me, you say?

dialogue.name: NIMBUS
dialogue.text: <gasp> Th-This medallion belonged to my mistress! Though it is faded, her name is engraved on it too, next to mine. Wherever did you find this!? Could it be...could it be you met her!?

dialogue.name: NIMBUS
dialogue.text: ...I see. Deep down I knew it was silly, but for a moment I couldn't help but hope.

dialogue.name: NIMBUS
dialogue.text: Yet to have this medallion brings me great comfort. 'Tis as if my feelings have reached my mistress, and she makes a gift of it to me.

dialogue.name: NIMBUS
dialogue.text: I swear I will keep it safe. Please pass my heartfelt thanks to the pixie who found it.

dialogue.name: OULSIGUN
dialogue.text: Nimbus has the medallion? Wonderful! My friend will be so pleased to hear this!

dialogue.name: OULSIGUN
dialogue.text: Who's my friend, you ask? Why, the leafman next to whom I found the medallion. If she was indeed Nimbus's mistress, she would have wanted him to have it. Here's a little something for helping to reunite them!
